ThoughtDef.label: psychic drone (low)
ThoughtDef.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.

ThoughtDef.label: psychic drone (medium)
ThoughtDef.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!

ThoughtDef.label: psychic drone (high)
ThoughtDef.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!

ThoughtDef.label: psychic drone (extreme)
ThoughtDef.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
